entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 12:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -27.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -30.7°C
Wind: ENE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
